title: The Pull of Blood
description: Beautiful 33 year old divorcee, Iris Gold's life is seemingly full of financial despair and nothingness. Unknowingly to Iris her life is about to change with one fateful phone-call from a mystical stranger. The Voice that reverberates through the receiver instantly mesmerizes Iris and shakes her to her core pulling her into a world of supernatural chaos that she may never find a way to escape... even if she wanted to.Along her journey Iris discovers nefarious secrets about herself, family and friends that she was never meant to know. The revelation of these secrets throws Iris into an erotic realm of paranormal darkness that tests her to ultimate limits and shapes her for a destiny she could not have ever imagined. Eventually Iris finds herself in the middle of a eclectic group of immortals that were damned to their existence by an unfortunate turn of events. Now she is forced to fight for her life, and the life of one she has come to love, in a horrific battle instigated by a dark realm of creatures so terrifying no mere mortal could imagine.
author: Holly Jones
